pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Luis Mendoza; Joe Mauer is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .987 OPS against them this season and .849 against everything else.
Luis Mendoza is still attacking Joe Mauer with the two-seam fastball even though Mauer hit one for a double last time up.
Luis Mendoza battled back from 3-0 to retire Joe Mauer.
